org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web

Class WebMvcAutoConfiguration.WebMvcAutoConfigurationAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
      • org.springframework.boot.autoconfigure.web.WebMvcAutoConfiguration.WebMvcAutoConfigurationAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WebMvcConfigurer
    Enclosing class:
    WebMvcAutoConfiguration

    @Configuration
 @Import(value=WebMvcAutoConfiguration.EnableWebMvcConfiguration.class)
 @EnableConfigurationProperties(value={WebMvcProperties.class,ResourceProperties.class})
public static class WebMvcAutoConfiguration.WebMvcAutoConfigurationAdapter
extends WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
